description: Timeline grid loads and displays hour markers
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a day with activity
Verify grid container renders
Verify hour column shows time labels (8 AM, 9 AM, etc.)
Verify each hour block is 80px tall
Verify only active hours plus buffer are displayed

description: Activity blocks positioned correctly within grid
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with activity data
Identify activity blocks in app columns
Verify blocks vertical position matches actual start time
Verify block height corresponds to activity duration
Verify minimum height of 4px for short activities

description: CRITICAL: Activity blocks open ImageGallery filtered to that time window on click
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with activity
Click on an activity block (e.g., VS Code block from 2:15-2:45 PM)
Verify ImageGallery modal opens
Verify gallery shows only screenshots from that activity's time range (2:15-2:45 PM)
Verify gallery title shows the app name and time range
Verify user can navigate through screenshots within that window
Verify closing gallery returns to timeline

description: AI Summary column displays session summaries
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with sessions
Locate AI Summary column (second sticky column)
Verify session blocks appear at correct vertical positions
Verify summary text is visible or '(No summary)' placeholder shown
Verify time range displayed on each block

description: CRITICAL: AI Summary blocks open ImageGallery for full session on click
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with sessions
Click on an AI Summary block (e.g., session from 9:00 AM - 11:30 AM)
Verify ImageGallery modal opens
Verify gallery shows all screenshots from that session's full time range
Verify gallery title shows session summary or time range
Verify user can navigate through all session screenshots
Verify closing gallery returns to timeline

description: Screenshot column shows thumbnails per hour
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with screenshots
Locate Screenshot column on the right
Verify thumbnails display for hours with screenshots
Verify '+N more' badge shows when more than 2 screenshots
Verify clicking thumbnail opens ImageGallery

description: Date navigation updates grid data correctly
steps: Navigate to Timeline page
Click 'Previous Day' button
Verify date updates and grid refreshes with new data
Click 'Next Day' button
Click 'Today' button and verify current date selected

description: Friendly app names display throughout timeline
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with activity
Check app column headers
Verify 'Chrome' not 'google-chrome'
Verify 'VS Code' not 'code'
Verify 'Terminal' not 'tilix' or 'gnome-terminal'

description: Daily stats sidebar shows accurate metrics
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with activity
Locate left sidebar Daily Summary Card
Verify total hours tracked displays
Verify start/end times match actual activity span
Verify break count and longest focus session shown

description: Category breakdown bar shows time distribution
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with activity
Locate breakdown bar in sidebar
Verify segments for focus, meetings, comms, other appear
Verify legend shows category labels with durations
Verify segment widths proportional to time

description: App usage pie chart renders correctly
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Locate app usage pie chart
Verify chart renders with colored segments
Verify hover shows app name and duration
Verify friendly app names display

description: CRITICAL: App usage table shows correct column data
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Locate app usage table below pie chart
Verify App Name column shows friendly names
Verify Duration column shows formatted time
Verify Sessions column shows numeric value (not undefined)

description: CRITICAL: Heatmap chart is enabled and displays
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Scroll to heatmap section
Verify heatmap component is rendered (not commented out)
Verify day-of-week labels on Y axis
Verify hour labels on X axis
Verify color intensity reflects activity level

description: Focus distribution shows all 24 hours
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Locate Focus Distribution chart
Verify all 24 hours displayed (0-23 or 12 AM-11 PM)
Verify inactive hours shown with different styling
Verify active hours show focus quality colors

description: Date range switching updates all charts
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Switch from Today to Week view
Verify all charts update with weekly data
Switch to Month view
Verify aggregated data displays correctly

description: Custom date range selection doesn't corrupt state
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Select Custom date range
Pick start date (e.g., Jan 1)
Pick end date (e.g., Jan 7)
Verify date picker values remain stable after selection
Verify charts update without console errors

description: Report generates successfully for all types
steps: Navigate to Reports page
Select 'Summary' report type
Enter time range 'today'
Click Generate
Verify report appears in preview
Repeat for 'Detailed' and 'Standup' types

description: Natural language time ranges parse correctly
steps: Navigate to Reports page
Enter 'today' and generate - verify correct date
Enter 'yesterday' and generate - verify correct date
Enter 'last week' and generate - verify 7-day range
Enter 'past 3 days' and generate - verify 3-day range

description: Markdown preview renders headers, bold, italic, code
steps: Generate a detailed report
Verify H1, H2, H3 headers render with proper styling
Verify **bold** text renders as bold
Verify *italic* text renders as italic
Verify `code` renders with background styling

description: CRITICAL: Markdown tables render in preview
steps: Generate a detailed report (which includes tables)
Scroll to app usage or session table section
Verify table renders with proper rows and columns
Verify not displaying raw pipe characters (| text |)
Verify table is readable and aligned

description: CRITICAL: Export buttons download actual files
steps: Generate a report
Click 'Markdown' export button
Verify browser downloads a .md file
Click 'HTML' export button
Verify browser downloads a .html file
Click 'JSON' export button
Verify browser downloads a .json file

description: CRITICAL: JSON export produces valid JSON
steps: Generate a report with quotes in content
Export as JSON
Open the downloaded file
Parse with JSON.parse() or json.loads()
Verify no parse errors occur
Verify content with special characters preserved correctly

description: CRITICAL: Delete report button actually deletes
steps: Generate a report
Note the report appears in history sidebar
Click delete button for that report
Confirm deletion
Verify report removed from history list
Refresh page and verify report still gone

description: Report history loads and displays previous reports
steps: Generate multiple reports
Navigate away and back to Reports page
Verify report history sidebar shows all generated reports
Click a report in history
Verify preview loads that report's content

description: Screenshots page loads and displays grid
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page
Verify screenshot grid renders
Verify thumbnails display for screenshots
Verify date selector shows current date
Verify lazy loading works (images load on scroll)

description: CRITICAL: Hour filter exists and works
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page
Locate hour filter dropdown or selector
Select a specific hour (e.g., 3 PM)
Verify only screenshots from that hour display
Clear filter and verify all screenshots return

description: App filter shows friendly names and filters correctly
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page
Open app filter dropdown
Verify friendly names display (Chrome, not google-chrome)
Select an app
Verify only screenshots from that app display

description: Window title search filters screenshots
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page with various window titles
Enter a search term in window title search
Verify only matching screenshots display
Verify search is case-insensitive
Clear search and verify all screenshots return

description: Preview modal opens and shows full details
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page
Click on a screenshot thumbnail
Verify full-size preview modal opens
Verify app name displayed
Verify window title displayed
Verify timestamp displayed

description: Session context shown on screenshots
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page
View screenshot thumbnails in grid
Verify session ID or session indicator visible
Click to preview
Verify can navigate to or view session context

description: Missing image files show error placeholder
steps: Have a screenshot record in DB where file is deleted from disk
Navigate to Screenshots page for that date
Verify broken image shows placeholder (not blank)
Verify 'File not found' or similar message shown
Verify UI doesn't crash

description: Batch delete works with confirmation
steps: Navigate to Screenshots page
Enable multi-select mode
Select multiple screenshots
Click batch delete button
Confirm deletion in dialog
Verify selected screenshots removed from grid

description: CRITICAL: No XSS in markdown rendering
steps: Generate a report containing **** in content
View report preview
Open browser developer console
Verify no JavaScript alert fires
Verify malicious content is escaped or stripped

description: Total time in sidebar matches activity sum
steps: Navigate to Timeline page with activity
Note total time displayed in sidebar
Manually sum activity block durations from tooltips
Verify totals match within 1-minute margin
Verify category breakdown percentages sum to 100%

description: Interactive elements have proper ARIA labels
steps: Navigate to Timeline page
Inspect activity blocks with browser dev tools
Verify role='button' on clickable elements
Verify aria-label describes the element
Verify keyboard focus visible on interactive elements

description: Timeline page loads within 2 seconds
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a day with 100+ activity blocks
Start timer when navigation begins
Stop timer when grid is fully rendered
Verify load time is under 2 seconds
Verify no visible lag during scroll

description: Calendar widget allows jumping to any past date
steps: Navigate to Timeline page
Open calendar widget
Select a date from last month
Verify grid updates with that date's data
Verify future dates are not selectable

description: Categorization rules can be viewed and modified
steps: Open Settings from sidebar
Navigate to categorization section
View existing rules list
Add a new rule (e.g., Firefox = other)
Save and verify rule persists
Delete rule and verify removal

description: Issue reporting dialog submits successfully
steps: Click Report Issue in sidebar
Fill in description
Select severity
Submit issue
Verify success toast appears
If webhook configured, verify Slack receives message

description: Empty day shows appropriate message
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a date with no activity
Verify empty state message displays
Verify message is helpful (not just blank)
Verify sidebar shows zero values appropriately

description: Git activity tracking captures commits
steps: Make a git commit in a tracked repository
Navigate to Analytics page
Locate Data Sources panel or Git section
Verify commit count increments
Verify repository name captured
Verify insertions/deletions tracked

description: Git stats show top repositories by activity
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with git history
Locate Git statistics section
Verify TopRepos list shows repositories
Verify each repo shows commit count
Verify repos ordered by activity (most active first)

description: Git stats aggregate correctly across date ranges
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Select 'Week' time range
Verify git stats show weekly totals
Select 'Month' time range
Verify git stats aggregate monthly
Verify totals match sum of daily commits

description: Shell command tracking captures terminal activity
steps: Execute several terminal commands
Navigate to Analytics page
Locate Shell statistics section
Verify total command count updates
Verify shell type detected (bash, zsh, etc.)

description: Shell stats show top commands used
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with shell history
Locate Shell statistics section
Verify TopCommands list populated
Verify command counts accurate
Verify commands ordered by frequency

description: Shell stats break down by shell type
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with shell history
Locate Shell statistics section
Verify ShellTypes breakdown shows
Verify bash vs zsh vs other differentiated
Verify counts per shell type

description: File activity tracking captures file events
steps: Create, modify, and delete files in tracked directories
Navigate to Analytics page
Locate File statistics section
Verify total file events count
Verify event types tracked (create, modify, delete)

description: File stats show events by type breakdown
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with file history
Locate File statistics section
Verify EventsByType map populated
Verify create/modify/delete counts shown
Verify breakdown adds up to total

description: File stats show top extensions
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with file history
Locate File statistics section
Verify TopExtensions list shows file types
Verify common extensions (.ts, .go, .md) appear
Verify extensions ordered by frequency

description: Browser activity tracking captures page visits
steps: Browse websites in tracked browser
Navigate to Analytics page
Locate Browser statistics section
Verify total visits count
Verify unique domains count

description: Browser stats show top domains visited
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with browser history
Locate Browser statistics section
Verify TopDomains list populated
Verify domains show visit counts
Verify domains ordered by frequency

description: Browser stats break down by browser type
steps: Navigate to Analytics page with browser history
Locate Browser statistics section
Verify BrowserCounts map shows breakdown
Verify Chrome/Firefox/etc differentiated
Verify counts per browser

description: Data sources panel visible in Analytics page
steps: Navigate to Analytics page
Locate Data Sources section/panel
Verify Git, Shell, Files, Browser sections present
Verify each section shows summary stats
Verify sections collapsible or expandable

description: Data sources included in generated reports
steps: Navigate to Reports page
Generate a Detailed report
Scroll through report content
Verify git commits mentioned if any
Verify shell activity mentioned if any
Verify file changes mentioned if any

description: Daily stats include data source counts
steps: Navigate to Analytics or Timeline page
View daily stats/summary
Verify shellCommands count displayed
Verify gitCommits count displayed
Verify filesModified count displayed

description: VISION: Git commits appear inline in timeline at correct timestamps
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a day with git commits
Scroll to the time when a commit was made
Verify git commit event appears in timeline (not just Analytics)
Verify commit shows: message, repo name, branch, timestamp
Verify commit is positioned correctly relative to screenshots
Click commit to see diff or navigate to repo

description: VISION: Shell commands appear inline in timeline
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a day with shell activity
Scroll to time when significant commands were run
Verify shell events appear in timeline
Verify command shows: command text, shell type, exit status if available
Verify commands grouped if many in quick succession
Click to expand command details or see surrounding context

description: VISION: File modifications appear inline in timeline
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a day with file activity
Scroll to time when files were modified
Verify file events appear in timeline
Verify event shows: filename, event type (create/modify/delete), path
Verify related files grouped together
Click to see file diff or open in editor

description: VISION: Browser visits appear inline in timeline
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a day with browser activity
Scroll to time when browsing occurred
Verify browser events appear in timeline
Verify visit shows: page title, domain, timestamp
Verify related visits to same domain grouped
Click to revisit URL or see visit context

description: VISION: All event types can be filtered in timeline
steps: Navigate to Timeline page
Locate event type filter controls
Toggle off 'Git' - verify commits hidden
Toggle off 'Shell' - verify commands hidden
Toggle off 'Files' - verify file events hidden
Toggle off 'Browser' - verify visits hidden
Toggle off 'Screenshots' - verify only events remain
Toggle all back on - verify full timeline restored

description: VISION: Timeline shows correlated activity clusters
steps: Navigate to Timeline page for a busy day
Identify a cluster of related activity
Verify cluster shows: commits + file changes + screenshots together
Verify visual grouping indicates these events are related
Click cluster to expand and see all events
Verify temporal proximity is visually clear

description: VISION: Search finds events across all data sources
steps: Navigate to Timeline page
Enter search term (e.g., 'auth')
Verify results include: git commits with 'auth' in message
Verify results include: files with 'auth' in path
Verify results include: browser visits to pages about auth
Verify results include: screenshots with 'auth' in window title
Click result to jump to that point in timeline

description: VISION: Reports include unified event timeline
steps: Navigate to Reports page
Generate a Detailed report for a day with mixed activity
Verify report includes chronological event list
Verify events show: git commits, shell commands, file changes
Verify events are in correct time order
Verify events correlate with session summaries

description: VISION: Going back in time reconstructs full context
steps: Navigate to Timeline for a past date (e.g., last month)
Find a session where you solved a problem
Verify you can see: what was on screen (screenshots)
Verify you can see: what code changed (git commits)
Verify you can see: what commands ran (shell)
Verify you can see: what you researched (browser)
Verify the full story of that work session is reconstructible
